channel.title: How to make a npc sell stuff
channel.description:
i tried making a npc appear in a certain area, to sell some stuff, i made the shop in, shops.cfg but when i tried using a npc, he just sold the same stuff, so any help would be appreciated
im using delta btw, and its a 474 with alot of 317 things

item.title: How to make a npc sell stuff
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

i sounded kinda dumb when i posted this, i was very sleepy.

what i meant to say was…

i am trying to add a new store. I have tried spawning different npc’s to sell things. But when i try that they already are shops. Anyways, i made a temporary solution by finding a non-important npc and making him sell what i want.

If someone can anwser me that would be great, Also have another question how do i change prices, on shops. everything is only 1gp.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc sell stuff

item.title: How to make a npc sell stuff
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

Try adding the Items id’s to the shop then compile.
You probably forgot to add the one’s you want him to sell you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc sell stuff
